channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13171] Change AccessControlClient methods to accept connection object to reduce setup time.
item.description:
Came across this todo task in the AccessControlClient java class.


  TODO: Make it so caller passes in a Connection rather than have us do this expensive

  setup each time.  This class only used in test and shell at moment though.

This change hopefully should speedup things a bit.
item.summary: Change AccessControlClient methods to accept connection object to reduce setup time.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attaching the patch for master branch. Tested the patch on my local box.

AccessControlClient is marked Public, we should deprecate existing methods in branch-1, right ?


70	  public static void grant(Connection connection, final TableName tableName,

Please add @param for connection.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment

against master branch at commit 76cbf7da650d5858cc4a29a9efc5c64610c09f8b.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

AccessControlClient is marked Public, we should deprecate existing methods in branch-1.

If folks are interested in getting this to branch-1, I can definitely do that..

Please add @param for connection.

Done. Also fixed checkstyle errors.
